turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order me a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What store location did you want me to place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order it from the 12015 Harbor Blvd, Garden Grove, CA 92840 location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of drink were you thinking of ordering?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order me a Cinnamon Cloud Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size did you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whatever their medium size is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Their medium size is a Grande and it's 16 ounces.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, 16oz is perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have a preference in the milk they use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have nonfat, whole, 2%, almond, coconut, and soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets go with the whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, what's the price?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, order that for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the order has been placed at the 12015 Harbor Blvd, Garden Grove, CA 92840 location. It will be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to your cellphone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome, enjoy your drink.
